scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && rm -f neardev && near js dev-deploy --base64File build/contract.base64 --deposit 1 && export $(cat ./neardev/dev-account.env) && near js call $CONTRACT_NAME init --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME --deposit 1 && echo $CONTRACT_NAME
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
